Package uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.federatedstore.operation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FederatedOperation
    A FederatedOperation is an FederatedOperation that is a special FederatedStore operation and should always be handled by the FederatedStore.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddGraph
    An Operation used for adding graphs to a FederatedStore.
    AddGraph.Builder  
    AddGraph.GraphBuilder<OP extends AddGraph,B extends AddGraph.GraphBuilder<OP,?>>  
    AddGraphWithHooks  
    AddGraphWithHooks.Builder  
    FederatedOperationChain<I,O_ITEM>
    An FederatedOperationChain holds an OperationChain that will be executed in one go on the federated graphs.
    FederatedOperationChain.Builder<I,O_ITEM>  
    FederatedOperationChainValidator
    Validation class for validating OperationChains against ViewValidators using the Federated Store schemas.
    GetAllGraphIds
    An Operation to get all the graphIds within scope of the FederatedStore.
    GetAllGraphIds.Builder  
    RemoveGraph
    An Operation used for removing graphs from a FederatedStore.
    RemoveGraph.Builder
